alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 1:16AM EDT until June 27 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lee County in central South Carolina... Central Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 116 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Poinsett State Park, or 8 miles southwest of South Sumter, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, South Sumter, Mulberry, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Turbeville, Mayesville, Pinewood, Paxville, Cane Savannah, Oswego, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, Foreston and East Sumter. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 115 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
